channel.title: Elyrion 718/742
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/64a734fea1214fc4713dee235988c869.png[/img]
----------------------------------------------------- Welcome to Elyrion Page -----------------------------------------------------------------
Informations about server:
- This is a economy server - Hosted 24/7 - 718 Loading 742 - 742 characters - Elyrion is a remake of Runescape 2012, the most unique content are in Elyrion. - Most of all are coded and working ! - All players are important for Elyrion ! - The server getting updates everydays !!
Website: http://elyrion742.site40.net/ Client: http://www.mediafire.com/download/w0nbd5y67gznwdz/Elyrion.jar https://www.dropbox.com/s/9pu73pbsud6uj8r/Elyrion.jar Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Elyrion-742/373365579400044?ref=hl
Vote: - [URL=http://http://www.google.com/toplist/details-38116-Elyrion_718742.html]Runelocus[/URL] - [URL=http://"http://www.****************/toplist/detail/8772/Elyrion_718742/"]Rune-Server[/URL]
----------------------------------------------------------------- Quests -----------------------------------------------------------------
- Imp catcher - The Restless Ghost
----------------------------------------------------------------- Server Rates -----------------------------------------------------------------
- Combat xp: 15x
- Non-combat xp: 6x
----------------------------------------------------- Features -----------------------------------------------------------------
- All skills are trainable - All ressources dungeons working - Working cape stand - Lodestone activing - Bob to repair armours - Ring of duelling - Heralds capes - Dice bag - Toy horsey - All God Wars bosses - Clan chats - Gnome agility with advanced parts - Barbarian agility - Spirit trees - Musicians - You can create slayer helmet - Item drop on death - All skills capes location - Flower game - Spells have sounds - Stronghold of security (25% completed) - Crystal key chest - Exchange your key to get rewards - Report player - Frost dragons - Living rock - Pets - Living rock cavern - Grotworms - Bank tabs - Revenants - Grotworms - Gilded altars - Chat filter - Fremennik dungeon - Puro puro - Flax picking - Lava flow mine - Reward box - Ring of wealth - Sawmill operator - Mithril dragons dungeon - Split whip vine - Dwarven rock cake - Ring of kinship - Fixed bows - Exchange loyalty points for spins - Cooking gauntlets - Culinaroamancer's gloves - Inferno adze - [COLOR="#B22222"] Ape atoll (New) [/COLOR] - Etc..
----------------------------------------------------- Grand Exchange ----------------------------------------------------------
- Fully working buying - Fully working selling - All items have price (I have do the 29999 items) - All sets of armours (Use chisel to open) - Grand Exchange have songs like runescape - You can buy all rares like runescape - Video below to see
----------------------------------------------------- Bosses -----------------------------------------------------------------
- Commander Zilyana - Nex - K'ril Tsutsaroth - Kree'arra - General Graardor - Giant mole - King black dragon - Kalphite queen - Nomad - TzTok-Jad - Corporeal beast - Hati - Chaos elemental - Queen black dragon - Tormented Demons - Wildywyrm - Yklador - More to come..
----------------------------------------------------- Members -----------------------------------------------------------------
- Members area - Members items - Special teleports - Exclusive shops - Membership system
----------------------------------------------------- Minigames -----------------------------------------------------------------
- Barrows brothers - Dominion tower (Rewards soon) - Runespan (Working on a 100% runespan) - Troll invasion - Crucible - Castle wars - Clan wars - Pest control - TzHaar fight cave with full waves - TzHaar fight pit - Kiln - Duel arena - Warriors Guild
]- Ring of duelling [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/c7oN8jb.jpg[/img]
- God Wars [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AEAcZX2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zlo1vKN.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZFiE7Bo.jpg[/img]
- Grand Exchange [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/89w0Eez.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DyqnNqC.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/E5FrPyL.jpg[/img]
- Heralds capes [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/T172Igc.jpg[/img]
- Lodestones activing [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Vqsg1L7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/d9KD7ks.jpg[/img]
- Ressource dungeons [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rbugpL7.jpg[/img]
- Runespan Portal [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AxgWElB.jpg[/img]
- Skills Capes [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rY0mMfG.jpg[/img]
- Spirit Trees [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ujTDwj4.jpg[/img]
- Members [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eNaPEpi.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qiyVgp2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pUyYSuZ.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0EQHuHk.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FRW34X2.jpg[/img]
- Chaos Elemental [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FJBDsU6.jpg[/img]
- Videos [video=youtube;kFWJl9Ek_oA]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kFWJl9Ek_oA&feature=youtu.be[/video]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WOyXzpxwa9A&feature=youtu.be]Elyrion 718/742 Wilderness Agility - YouTube[/url]
- Enjoy server !
